data.title: Top Nasdaq Stocks Don't Care About the White House: Here's Why
data.text: The Nasdaq Composite had soared almost 4% by midday Wednesday.

data.title: Why Big Tech Leaders Are Billed as the Top Election Winners
data.text: Calling out winners and losers based on an election cycle is a tricky business. As of Wednesday, November 4, it seems the stock market wants to declare that the technology sector may be the big beneficiary from the 2020 elections.

data.title: Twitter Will Let Jack Dorsey Keep His Job
data.text: Activist investors are satisfied with letting the eccentric chief executive continue leading two companies.
